text: Kananjalo ngeMini apho Aza kubahlanganisa (ndaweninye) bonke (Athi kubo): “Hini na nina bandla leejinni! Baninzi enabalahlekisayo ebantwini”, abahlobo bazo phakathi koluntu baya kuthi: “Nkosi yethu, sizuzile omnye16 komnye, kodwa ngoku sifikelele esiphelweni sexesha Obe Usibekele lona”. Athi Yena: “UMlilo mawube yindawo (yenu) yokuhlala, Niya kuhlala apho kuwo kude kube ngunaphakade, ngaphandle kokuba kuthande uAllâh. Inene iNkosi yakho (Muhammad) nguSobulumko, uSolwazi”
